pkgmetadata.longdescription: Piecewise Structural Equation Modelling // Conduct dsep tests (piecewise SEM) of a directed, or mixed, acyclic graph without latent variables (but possibly with implicitly marginalized or conditioned latent variables that create dependent errors) based on linear, generalized linear, or additive modelswith or without a nesting structure for the data. Also included are functions to do desp tests step-by-step,exploratory path analysis, and Monte Carlo X2 probabilities. This package accompanies Shipley, B, (2026).Cause and Correlation in Biology: A User's Guide to Path Analysis, StructuralEquations and Causal Inference (3rd edition). Cambridge University Press.
